subject: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRE
body:
FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
Attention Beneficiary,
We are hereby informing you regarding the transaction concerning
your outstanding  fund which you are having with the Bank in Ivory
Coast which was discovered through our network gazette .
However,  during our last meeting of this first quarter of the year
due to certain reports from the International  Communities , European
Union , World Bank Auditors concerning the Foreign debts after so many
investigations we discovered that a lot of foreigners that awarded
contracts, Inheritance, Lottery Winning in west Africa Region which
you are among  those has not been paid due to certain unnecessary
demands of fees from the  banks and some government bodies.
Meanwhile any bank  that failed to release the fund as instructed will
be penalised by the Int' banking laws under (IMF) and world bank
Auditors , Pls for your information ignore any mail or telephone call
from any part of the world  unless from our office or the paying bank
For this reason, the United Nation has approved to compensate you
with the sum of $750,000. 00 Dollars  with 7 among others In This
United Nation West Africa Head Office The Payment will Be Issued into
ATM Visa Card And Will Be Send to You From The BANK in Cote D'iVoire
We Need Your Current Address Passport Copy, First And Second Pages
,
Your Private Telephone Number So That You Will Easily Be Reached
When The Parcel Arrives At Your Home Door Step.
As Soon As We Received Those Information Needed and your response, We
shall then  Now send to you the  Contact Of The Paying Bank For The
Delivery Of Your ATM Visa Card Or Any Other Means You Want It To Be
Yours Sincerely
MRS. MARY JOHNSON

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRE
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

Thank you for reaching out and informing me about this situation. It's quite surprising to hear about the funds in Ivory Coast, as I wasn't aware of any such thing. 

I'm curious, how did my name come up in your network gazette? And could you please elaborate more on the reports from the European Union World Bank Auditors? I'd like to understand better what they found concerning foreign debts.

Also, it's interesting that the United Nation has approved a compensation sum. Could you tell me more about how this process works? How was the amount determined?

Regarding your request for my current address, passport copy and private telephone number, I must apologize but I am not comfortable sharing such personal information over email due to privacy concerns.

Looking forward to hearing more details from you.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)

the UBA BANK for further details before it is too late.

Dear start counting from the day you were contacted and today presently.
How many days have gone out of the 10 days given ? So calculate it yourself


SINCERELY YOURS,


MRS. MARY  JOHNSON.
UNITED NATIONS  SECRETARY FOR PEACE KEEPING FORCE MISSION ON FINANCIAL
MATTERS.IVORY COAST ABIDJAN.
Direct Line...+225 05 05 70 23 98

body:

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by this program and the opportunity it presents. However, I must admit that some parts of your message are a bit unclear to me.

Could you please provide more details about this IMF programme? What exactly does it entail and how was I chosen as a qualified participant?

Also, could you clarify what the ATM card is for? How is it related to the UBA Bank and what role does the United Nations play in all of this?

I appreciate your patience and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Rebecca

subject: Re: CONTACT THE UBA BANK NOW
body:

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear that my name was among those contacted by the IMF. Could you please provide more details about this program? What exactly does it entail?

subject: Re: CONTACT THE UBA BANK NOW
body:
Date. 12/02/2024

ATTN. REBECCA, The reason is because some of these names have been scammed
by some scammers years pass so the IMF mapped out some funds to
compensate them all, and not all the funds they have spent but to make them
happy once again.

What I mean by returning it back is your ATM CARD for refusal of
claims that in other way if you refused to comply or delay to finish up
considering the date of the expiration of the programme because it has a
date to end it.

Mr. Sarata Kone Thiam is the UBA BANK director whom the IMF has chosen to
handle the said affair.

Mind you the UBA BANK is not the ATM CARD to you, it will be delivered to
you through the Bank SPECIAL BANKERS COURIER SERVICE AGENT. It is for the
government to avoid Scammed.But the UBA BANk will always been on guard to
monitor the agent until the ATM CARD gets to your home door step



Below Is The Bank Approved By The United Nation To Make The Necessary
outstanding
Compensation Payment Through ATM CARD delivery to your home mailing address

Mr. Sarata KONE -THIAM

when contacting him today through email is that, you will only express
yourself that you were instructed to contact him by the Order of the United
Nation. Then as soon as he received the mail message from you, he will now
update and gives you more details on how to go about it to receive your ATM
CARD to your home mailing address doorstep peacefully

Moreover, the reason why the said SPECIAL BANKERS COURIER SERVICE AGENT is
involved in this is because the other UPS AND DHL AND FEDEX agents has been
disappointed many clients that turn out to be a victim by making use of
DHL, FEDEX and UPS to deliver ATM CARD to the beneficiaries. So do to
somany complains and report to the FBI, the IMF now decided to make use of

As a matter of fact, go ahead an contact the UBA BANK now as soon as

body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

Thank you for your detailed message. I'm quite intrigued by the information you've shared about the UBA BANK and Mr. Thiam Kone Sarata. It's interesting to know that he is already aware of my intention to get in touch with him regarding the ATM CARD.

I'm curious, though, how did the United Nations come to be involved in this matter? And why was it decided to use a SPECIAL BANKERS COURIER SERVICE AGENT instead of more common services like DHL or UPS?

Hello my dear, the reason why the United Nation is involved is to make sure
the security to be 100 percent sure for delivery as eye monetary to the IMF
here in West Africa. The Special Bankers Courier Service is the agent
worthy of making this delivery to avoid stories. The DHL and
Fedex including Ups has cost a lots of damages in West Africa with insiders
working with these agents mentioned as criminals, so a lot of damages has
been made so because of it, the government of the country must be involved
in this programme for a work well done

if i come across any of your messages i will respond back on my return

SINCERELY YOURS,

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRE. CONTACT TEH UBA BANK NOW
body:
FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON
FINANCIAL MATTERS)

Date. 14/02/2024

ATTN. REBECCA, I believe I have explained enough that will make you
understand. If you want to hear more details, kindly contact the Uba Bank
and then the Bank will explain more. I have told you that the United Nation
Organised this programme, while the IMF empowered the fund for the
compensation to those who have benefited from the gift. The reason why I
said it will be returned back to the IMF is that, if you delay from
claiming your Atm Card then it will be returned back to them
without wasting time. This was the instruction given to the United Nation.
And Mind you there were some expiring days ahead of the Atm Card should you
refuse to claim your Card quickly. The Expiring days are 10 days, and
counting from when we both started communicating, you will see that the
days remaining are not much, so it is better you contact the Uba Bank  as
soon as possible.

Dear your Atm Card will be delivering your Card from Cote D'ivoire to your

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRE
body:
Hello there,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm just a simple person who enjoys sharing information and learning new things. I've come across some interesting facts recently that I thought might pique your interest as well.

Did you know that the world's largest desert is actually Antarctica, not the Sahara? It's considered a desert because it receives very little precipitation - less than 200mm per year!

Isn't that fascinating? Do you have any fun facts or interesting tidbits to share as well?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
body:
FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL
MATTERS)

Date. 26/02/2024

This notice is to inform you that the United Nations Office has given out
directions to all paying bank in regards to the delivery of your ATM
card.Consequently,this office wish to state that all delivery of ATM card
from bank to beneficiary shall be concluded within 5 working days Been this
week Friday, and delivery made to the beneficiary.the beneficiary must
within the window of 5days comply with all directive for the delivery.

It is also instructive that in the case of non compliance,the ATM shall be
returned back and the IMF shall completely place a cancellation order to
the fund which will be irrevocable.

The United nation has also issued an order that there shall be no frivolous
demand from any paying bank or institution henceforth as the United Nation
is monitoring all the payment and would not hesitate to sanction any
institution or bank that fails this instruction.

Therefore,all beneficiaries must act and obey this instruction within the
said time for the delivery without time wasting.

This order supersedes other instructions received in regards to this
payment.
BEST REGARDS

MRS MARY JOHNSON

Could you please explain a bit more about how this works? For instance, what is the purpose of these ATM cards and why are they being delivered? Also, could you clarify what you mean by "the IMF shall completely place order to the fund"?

I'm also curious about the sanctions mentioned in your message. What kind of sanctions would be imposed on any individual or bank that fails to comply with these directives?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

questions, so that is why they are not responding to your messages because
they saw it as an irrelevant message. The UBA BANK only wanted you to claim
your ATM CARD and leave them alone

Yours sincerely

Mrs Mary Johnson

are for is to make sure you receive your ATM CARD without asking so many
questions. The UBA BANK does not need such disturbance. Please make sure
you pay the fee for them to deliver your ATM CARD. For your information,
this week Friday is the final date that has been declared to you already.

Yours sincerely

Mrs Mary Johnson
